dict.string: BIGDOOKIE needs access to your camera to take photos during gameplay.
BIGDOOKIE needs access to your microphone to record audio during gameplay.
BIGDOOKIE needs access to your photo library to upload and share gameplay-related images.
BIGDOOKIE needs access to your location for local multiplayer and GPS-related gameplay features.
BIGDOOKIE requires constant access to your location to support background features.
BIGDOOKIE needs Bluetooth access to connect to external devices for enhanced gameplay.
BIGDOOKIE uses motion sensors to track in-game movements.
BIGDOOKIE uses your contacts to invite friends to join gameplay.
BIGDOOKIE uses Face ID to authenticate users securely during login.
BIGDOOKIE tracks your gameplay preferences to enhance your experience and show relevant ads.
BIGDOOKIE needs permission to send you notifications for gameplay updates and reminders.
BIGDOOKIE needs access to your health data for tracking fitness-related achievements in the game.
BIGDOOKIE requires permission to update your health data to sync with gameplay achievements.
